channel.title: Visualizations on Joel Soroos
channel.description: Recent content in Visualizations on Joel Soroos

item.description: A collection of data visualizations Iâ€™ve produced for fun using the {ggplot2}(https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) package in the programming language R. All visualizations are the result of the code without any post-processing. Contributions to #TidyTuesday {#tidytuesday} v #TidyTuesday is a weekly data project aimed at the R ecosystem and the {tidyverse} package bundle to wrangle, explore and visualize the data set that is provided by the R4DS Online Learning Community.
